---

title: "Manage Platform Status"
description: "Manage the platform status of a particular modfile. This endpoint does not set any file live, instead it allows you to approve and deny new uploads. To set a file as the *live* file for the approved platforms after you have reviewed them, you must call the [Edit Modfile](/restapi/docs/edit-modfile) with the active flag enabled."

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Manage Platform Status"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/mods/{mod-id}/files/{file-id}/platforms"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Manage the platform status of a particular modfile. This endpoint does not set any file live, instead it allows you to approve and deny new uploads. To set a file as the *live* file for the approved platforms after you have reviewed them, you must call the [Edit Modfile](/restapi/docs/edit-modfile) with the active flag enabled.

    :::note
    This is ony applicable if the parent game has cross-platform moderation enabled. A successful request will return the updated [Modfile object](/restapi/docs/schemas/modfile-object).
    :::

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"Game ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1},{"name":"mod-id","in":"path","description":"Mod ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":2},{"name":"file-id","in":"path","description":"Modfile ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":3}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"properties":{"approved":{"description":"An array containing one or more [platform strings](/restapi/platforms#targeting-a-platform) that the specified modfile is approved for","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"denied":{"description":"An array containing one or more [platform strings](/restapi/platforms#targeting-a-platform) that the specified modfile is denied for. <br /><br />__NOTE:__ You cannot mark a live modfile as denied, if a modfile is live the only option to remove it is to set another [existing modfile](/restapi/docs/edit-modfile) as the live modfile for that platform, or add a [new modfile](/restapi/docs/add-modfile).","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object.
